name: Baby Bites Back!
description:
Baby Bites Back! is a 2D side scroller “beat-em-up”, where a toddler named Gregg must traverse their house, fighting different enemies with various baby-themed attacks. The team’s intention is to create a whimsical fighting game experience, centred around child-like aesthetics. Being motivated by media such as the Rugrats (1991), we aim to translate these themes into video game format, as a unique gaming experience.

Programming by Justin Perumal 
Background and UI design by Ashish Juggpall
Character design and animations by Michaela Bussey

This game was created over two months for an exam submission in December 2021.
